es.ull.isaatc.simulation.condition
Class Condition

java.lang.Object
  es.ull.isaatc.simulation.condition.Condition
Direct Known Subclasses:
ElementTypeCondition, NotCondition, PercentageCondition, TrueCondition
public class Condition
extends java.lang.Object

A logical condition which is used for creating restrictions or uncertain situations. A Condition is "checked" by using the check(Element) method and returns true if the condition is satisfied and false otherwise.

Author:
Yeray Callero

Field Summary
 Simulation simul
          Current simulation, which is used to communicate with simulation variables.
